Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm looking for a way to change a room background color (the grid_fill attribute basically) after a certain action has been done. Is there a way to do this? I guess this will also need to redraw the room by using some internal functions. Thank you
Posts.HTML: Hi, I'm looking for a way to change a room background color (the grid_fill attribute basically) after a certain action has been done. Is there a way to do this? I guess this will also need to redraw the room by using some internal functions. Thank you
